name: amCharts
description:
A Design and Code mirrored library. Made for personal or professional use - feel free to use the interfaces, social media or any kind of layout on Figma.


"Our charts were designed to feel modern, sleek and fast, out-of-the box. But don't take our word for it â€“ check out our demos (in code) and fall in love."


https://www.amcharts.com/demos/


And best of all, our libs integrate thoroughly with TypeScript, Angular, React, Vue and plain JavaScript apps.


Charts on this version:


  • Simple Column Chart
  • Column and Line Mix
  • Pareto Diagram
  • Grouped and Sorted Columns
  • Drag-ordering of Bars
  • Sorted Bar Chart
  • Clustered Bar Chart
  • Comparing Different Date Values Google Analycs Styles
  • Pie Chart
  • Clustered Cloumn Chart
  • Mixed Daily and Intra-Day Chart
  • Bar and Line Chart Mix


Enjoy all the charts and support docs, help us in the comments!
